Setting.Name: Number of partitions for k-fold cross-validation test

Comment.Text: The Classifier Trainer box produces a configuration file at the end of the experiment which will be used during online sessions. The box raised the stimulation OVTK_StimulationId_TrainCompleted at the end of the training process. This stimulation is used to stop the scenario with a Player Controller.
